page.title: 05SCHOOLS IN SLOUGH (CONT)
page.content: {St. Anthony's Middle School}has children aged from eight to twelve. It is quite a large school and has a large field. It also has a very beautiful Roman Catholic Church. The children attend services and sometimes even have lessons there. Priests visit the church and schools frequently. { William Penn Nursery, First}and {Middle Schools}are spread out in Penn Road. The Nursery School has children who are below five. The First and Middle Schools cater for the same age ranges as St. Anthony's. They have a Gymnasium which is also used for the mid_day meal by both the First and Middle Schools. They have a small plot of grass area to play on but have to go to Stoke Park playing fields for team games.
